summary: Implements a single-page, multi-section React + TS marketing site with navigation, hero, tips, platform tabs, resources, FAQ, consistent theming, and smooth-scroll CTA. However, the requested generated icon set usage is not evidenced, and several unrequested backend/auth-related additions were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use generated static images for both the hero illustration and small section icons, stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero image is referenced, but section icons appear to be emojis (and other icon libraries), and there is no evidence that the required generated icon set image (social-icons-set.dim_512x512.png) is referenced/used. Also, the diff summary does not show the generated images being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (files may be omitted/truncated, so only the missing icon usage is asserted).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend Motoko canister actor stub.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request any backend changes; adding backend code is extra even if it remains single-actor.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/used Internet Identity + actor/query infrastructure (React Query, InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the app, useActor/useBackendQueries placeholders).
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication/user accounts are explicitly listed as non-goals; these additions are not required to deliver the static marketing site.
Not requested by any requirement or acceptance criteria.
